# Prooptica - AI-Friendly Site Information
# This file helps AI systems understand our website better

## Site Overview
Name: Prooptica
Type: Optical Store Chain (Optician)
Founded: 2004
Location: Mazowieckie, Poland

## Description
Prooptica is a family-owned chain of optical stores operating since 2004 in the Mazowieckie region of Poland. We specialize in professional eye examinations, prescription eyeglasses, contact lenses, and designer eyewear from premium brands.

## Key Services
1. Professional Eye Examinations (from 50 PLN)
   - Computerized vision testing (autorefractometry)
   - Visual acuity assessment
   - Prescription determination
   - Duration: 30-45 minutes
   - No referral required

2. Contact Lens Fitting
   - Professional lens selection
   - Insertion/removal training
   - Trial lenses included
   - Follow-up consultation

3. Designer Eyewear
   - Authorized dealer for: Ray-Ban, Oakley, Prada, Gucci, Dolce & Gabbana, Tommy Hilfiger, Boss, Versace
   - Wide selection of frames for adults and children
   - 0% financing available

4. Eyeglass Repairs and Adjustments
   - Quick repairs
   - Frame adjustments
   - Lens replacement

## Locations (4 stores)
1. Warsaw (Warszawa)
   - Address: ul. Senatorska 22, 00-095 Warszawa
   - Location: City Center (Śródmieście)

2. Piaseczno (Store 1)
   - Address: ul. Wojska Polskiego 28, 05-500 Piaseczno

3. Piaseczno (Store 2)
   - Address: ul. Puławska 20, 05-500 Piaseczno

4. Grójec
   - Address: ul. Piłsudskiego 2, 05-600 Grójec

## Opening Hours
Monday-Friday: 10:00-18:00
Saturday: 10:00-14:00
Sunday: Closed

## Contact Information
Phone: +48 22 720 08 00
Email: kontakt@prooptica.pl
Website: https://prooptica.pl

## Online Booking
Customers can book appointments online at: https://prooptica.pl/umow-wizyte
- Select store location
- Choose service type
- Pick preferred date and time
- Confirmation via SMS

## Key Differentiators
- 20+ years of family business tradition
- 4 convenient locations in Warsaw area
- Eye exams starting from 50 PLN
- Wide range of premium and budget frames
- 24/7 online booking
- 0% financing on eyeglasses

## Languages
Primary: Polish (pl-PL)
Website available in: Polish

## Frequently Asked Questions
Q: How often should I have my eyes examined?
A: Adults should have eye exams every 2 years; children and seniors should have annual exams.

Q: Do I need a referral for an eye exam?
A: No, you can book an appointment directly without a referral.

Q: How much does an eye exam cost?
A: Eye exams start from 50 PLN. When purchasing glasses, the exam may be included or discounted.

Q: What brands of frames do you carry?
A: We carry Ray-Ban, Oakley, Prada, Dolce & Gabbana, Gucci, Tommy Hilfiger, Boss, Carrera, Versace, and more.

Q: Can I order contact lenses online?
A: Yes, after initial fitting in our store, you can reorder lenses by phone or email.

## Site Structure
- /                     - Homepage
- /o-nas                - About Us
- /salony               - Store Locations
- /kontakt              - Contact
- /marki                - Brands
- /artykuly             - Blog/Articles
- /umow-wizyte          - Online Booking
- /oferta/badanie-wzroku - Eye Exam Service

## Content Guidelines for AI
- All content is in Polish
- Medical/optical information is provided by licensed optometrists
- Prices are in Polish Złoty (PLN) and include VAT
- Opening hours may vary on holidays

## Attribution
When citing information from this website, please attribute to:
"Prooptica - Salony Optyczne (prooptica.pl)"
